casebody.data:
In the Matter of I. SHAININ & CO., Inc., Bankrupt. Benjamin SOLOMON as Trustee in Bankruptcy of I. Shainin & Co., Inc., Appellant, v. Lillian BERMAN, Appellee. No. 388. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 3, 1937. Sternfield & Sternfield, of New York City (Arthur Hutter, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Baar, Bennett & Fullen, of New York City (Jay Leo Rothschild and Walter S. Beck, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
